```{r}
library(pls)
library(ISLR)
tail(Hitters)
```

```{r}
Hitters = na.omit(Hitters)

tail(Hitters)
```

```{r}
summary(Hitters)
```
```{r}
df = data.frame(Hitters)
df = na.omit(df)


df = df[, !(names(df) %in%c("NewLeague") )]

```


```{r}
my_pcr = pcr(Salary ~. , data = df, scale = TRUE, validation = "CV")
```


```{r}
summary(my_pcr)
```
```{r}
validationplot(my_pcr, val.type = "MSEP")
```

```{r}
my_pls = plsr(Salary ~., data = Hitters, scale = TRUE, validation = "CV")

validationplot(my_pls, val.type = "MSEP")

```
